title: Enhance LIC plan comparison app with side-by-side comparison, calculators, and ROI analysis

requirements.text: Create a side-by-side plan comparison view that allows users to select multiple LIC plans (Jivan Labh 736, Jivan Umang, Bima Laxmi 881, Jivan Lakshya, Jivan Utsav, Jivan Shanti 850) and display their key features, premiums, maturity benefits, and policy terms in a tabular format for easy comparison

quotes: What should users be able to do? Compare plans side-by-side

acceptanceCriteria: Users can select 2 or more plans from a checkbox list
Comparison table displays plan names, premium amounts, maturity benefits, policy terms, and key features
Table is responsive and works on mobile devices
Comparison view is available in Marathi, Hindi, and English

requirements.text: Build an interactive premium calculator that allows users to input their age, desired sum assured, and policy term, then calculates the required monthly/annual premium for each LIC plan based on the premium tables from the uploaded images

quotes: Should the app compute maturity amounts

acceptanceCriteria: Calculator accepts age (numeric input), sum assured (numeric input), and policy term (dropdown or numeric input)
Calculator displays premium amounts for applicable plans
Results update dynamically as user changes inputs
Calculator supports all three languages (Marathi, Hindi, English)

requirements.text: Create a maturity benefit calculator that takes user inputs (premium amount, policy term, age) and calculates the total maturity amount including bonuses and guaranteed additions for each plan, using the data from the uploaded plan images
acceptanceCriteria: Calculator accepts premium amount, policy term, and age as inputs
Displays calculated maturity benefits including sum assured, bonuses, and guaranteed additions
Shows breakdown of maturity components (base amount + bonuses)
Available in Marathi, Hindi, and English

requirements.text: Implement a Return on Investment (ROI) analysis feature that calculates and displays the effective annual return percentage for each plan based on total premiums paid versus maturity benefits received, with visual comparison charts
acceptanceCriteria: ROI calculation considers total premiums paid and maturity benefits
Displays ROI percentage for each plan
Includes visual chart (bar chart or line chart) comparing ROI across plans
Supports trilingual display

requirements.text: Add search and filter functionality that allows users to filter LIC plans by criteria including age range (minimum/maximum entry age), budget range (monthly/annual premium limits), and financial goals (savings, pension, money-back, guaranteed returns), with real-time filtering of the plan grid

quotes: Filter by age, budget, and financial goals

acceptanceCriteria: Filter panel includes age range inputs, premium budget slider or inputs, and financial goal checkboxes
Plans are filtered in real-time as user adjusts criteria
Filtered results maintain trilingual support
Clear filters button resets all selections

requirements.text: Extract and structure detailed data from all 6 uploaded LIC plan images including premium tables with age-based rates, maturity benefit formulas, policy terms, guaranteed additions/bonuses, risk coverage details, and special features, then integrate this data into the backend LICPlan records to support accurate calculator and comparison functionality

quotes: Extract and structure data from 6 LIC plan images

acceptanceCriteria: Jivan Labh 736 data includes premium table with age-based rates and maturity calculations
Jivan Umang data includes guaranteed bonus structure and lifetime pension details
Bima Laxmi 881 data includes money-back schedule and maturity benefit formula
Jivan Lakshya data includes bonus structure and maturity calculation
Jivan Utsav data includes guaranteed return rates and maturity formula
Jivan Shanti 850 data includes annuity rate table across different ages and deferment periods
All extracted data is stored in structured format accessible to frontend calculators

constraints: Do not modify immutable frontend paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
Use only React, Shadcn, Tailwind, and React Query for frontend implementation
All calculations must be performed client-side in the frontend
Premium and maturity calculations must be based on actual data from the uploaded plan images
nonGoals: Integration with external payment gateways beyond existing setup
User authentication beyond existing Internet Identity setup
